"About Time Extension Quests":
"In this Quest, your objective is to defeat as many enemies as possible within the time limit.

The time limit increases with each enemy you defeat.

During this Quest, various Photon Boost Crates will appear., which can be accessed to grant the accessing player a temporary boost. The enhancement granted depends on the color of the crate.
"

"The Quest is cleared when all target enemies are defeated, or when the time limit expires.

Your result rank at the end of the Quest will depend on the Quest Points you have earned by defeating enemies."
